data.eml:eml: A new species of Coenosopsia Malloch (Diptera, Anthomyiidae) from southern Brazil and a reappraisal of the cladistic relationships of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bortolanza, Mariza, Carvalho, Claudio José Barros De, Lara, Ana Paula Conter (2006): A new species of Coenosopsia Malloch (Diptera, Anthomyiidae) from southern Brazil and a reappraisal of the cladistic relationships of the genus. Zootaxa 1242: 37-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172892
